message.content:
{"id": "49890", "title": "Bug 49890: Nio Selector issue on linux platform", "description": "Bug 49890: Nio Selector issue on linux platform

Server's CPU reaches 100% and stays at 100% until the server is restarted. This issue was reproduced with Java versions 1.6.007, 1.6.018, 1.6.021. It is a duplicate of issue Bug 46373. It appears that the Jetty team has fixed the problem as mentioned in this link: [JETTY937]. I have added some logging to the NioEndpoint.java file.

Attachments:
- NioEndpoint.7z: Patched NioEndpoint.java file (with logging)
- web.7z: Simple web application
", "OB": "The server's CPU reaches 100% and stays at 100% until the server is restarted.", "EB": "This issue can be reproduced by sending multiple requests to the web application (e.g., by pressing F5 in the browser and holding the button).", "SR": "This issue has never been reproduced on the Windows platform."}

origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>

", 'OB': '', 'EB': 'To reproduce jvm bug we should do several requests(we can just press F5 in browser and hold button) to web application. ', 'SR': 'And it is never reproduced on windows platform.In the attach:NioEndpoint.7zpatched NioEndpoint.java (with logging)web.7zsimple web application. '}
